apps.dependencyInstallCommand: npm config list -l; npm ping --registry=https://registry.npmjs.org/ || true; printf "registry=https://registry.npmjs.org/\nalways-auth=false\n" > .npmrc && printf "" > .npmrc-global && npm ci --legacy-peer-deps --userconfig=.npmrc --globalconfig=.npmrc-global --registry=https://registry.npmjs.org/
